document_data.name: [[Xarlraun]]
document_data.Description: It was the size of a hut, as tall as three men, an absolute unit of a beholder. Its outer plates were dark and scarred.
document_data.Personality: The beholder counted itself wise in the ways of men.
document_data.Abilities: It had developed an immunity to a number of [[poison]]s, centuries prior.
document_data.Activities: It conferenced with [[Fzoul Chembryl]], and sometimes participated in [[Zhentarim]] meetings.
document_data.Possessions: The beholder possessed an amulet that granted it control over [[Iliph Thraun]].{{cite book/Crown of Fire/TPB 2002|83-85|4}}
document_data.Relationships: Fzoul Chembryl answered to it. It also possessed a number of contacts it used to keep itself apprised of current Zhentarim affairs.
